page.title: 10Sainsfoins Stables
page.content: There are about 10 horses whose ages range from 2-10 years.They stay at Dr.Hopper's stables from 6 weeks-1 year and then they go to some racing stables.The horses are worth Â£5000-80000 and they all come from Newmarket.Mr. Cliff Woof, Mr. Barney Cerley and Mr. O'Callaghan own the horses and they also train them. The typical day for a trainer is in the morning he cleans the stables out,brushes the horses over,exercises them and feeds them.In the evenings he does the same he does not exercise them. There is only one helper who used to be a jockey.The horses' diet is hay,race horse nuts,and crushed corn.There are 18 stables,10 of which are being rebuilt and his stables cover 186 acres.
